meta.project: ONA Process Management and Compliance Dashboard
meta.prepared_by: Generated by AI based on provided documents and codebase

product_overview: A comprehensive digital solution designed to support the management, monitoring, and continuous improvement of organizational processes aligned with ONA accreditation standards, including tracking of health actions, process mapping, and incident management.
core_goals: Provide a centralized dashboard to visualize KPIs, process status, and compliance metrics related to ONA accreditation.
Enable detailed tracking and management of 34 health-related action items with comments and status updates.
Facilitate advanced filtering and reporting capabilities to support data-driven decision making.
Integrate AI-powered assistance for user support and process guidance.
Support export of custom reports in PDF and Excel formats for sharing and documentation.
Ensure responsive and accessible user interface across devices with theme customization.
Deliver real-time notifications and maintain persistent interaction histories for user actions and AI chat.
Streamline process mapping, monitoring, and improvement with embedded workflows and status tracking.
key_features: Dashboard Analytics with multi-dimensional charts showing ONA compliance KPIs (process mapping, plan execution, occurrence handling).
Action Management System for health actions including detailed tracking, comments history, and status changes.
Advanced Filtering tool allowing multi-criteria searches by text, status, responsible user, sector, and date ranges.
PDF and Excel export functionality to generate customized reports based on filtered data.
AI Assistant with specialized conversational modules integrated for ONA and Microsoft 365 assistance, maintaining chat histories persistently.
Mobile-first Responsive UI with dark and light theme toggling and a collapsible navigation sidebar.
Real-time Notification System using toast messages for immediate feedback on user activities.
Custom React hooks designed for data processing, device detection, and UI state management.
Routing system with React Router to handle dashboard and error pages seamlessly.
Robust UI component library built on shadcn/ui and Radix UI for buttons, dialogs, inputs, charts, badges, toasts, etc.
user_flow_summary: User logs in and lands on the Dashboard overview screen displaying real-time KPIs and process statuses.
User applies advanced filters on actions or processes to narrow down data views.
User reviews and updates action items, adding comments or changing statuses.
User exports selected views or reports in PDF or Excel format for sharing or documentation.
User interacts with the AI Assistant chat modal for guidance related to ONA compliance or MS 365 usage.
User navigates through responsive menus on desktop or mobile, toggling themes and collapsing sidebar as needed.
System pushes notifications for action updates, new comments, or system alerts.
Administrators monitor process mapping, implantation progress, and incident occurrences through dedicated dashboards and charts.
validation_criteria: Dashboard analytics reflect accurate real-time data aligned with backend sources and KPIs as shown in reports.
Action Management system tracks all 34 health actions completely, including comments and status changes.
Advanced filtering returns correct and expected results under combined filter criteria.
Exported PDF and Excel reports contain accurate data matching the current filtered view and include correct formatting.
AI Assistant converses contextually and retains chat history persistently across sessions.
Responsive UI accommodates all major device viewports and reacts fluidly to theme toggle and sidebar operations.
Notifications appear promptly and reliably for all tracked events with no missing alerts.
Routing correctly displays main pages and error pages with no broken links or malformed routes.
UI components conform to design specifications and standardized behavior across the application.
Process mapping and implantation status dashboards match progress data in planning documents and reports.
Incidence tracking accurately displays occurrence counts, resolution status, and timelines in the system.
